sql: SELECT * FROM t_fanding_log WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2025-08-01' AND '2025-08-31';

SELECT tp.* FROM t_payment tp JOIN t_creator tc ON tp.seller_creator_no = tc.no JOIN t_member tm ON tc.member_no = tm.no WHERE tp.pay_datetime BETWEEN '2025-08-01' AND '2025-08-31' AND tm.nickname IN ('강환국 작가', '고래돈공부');

SELECT tfl.* FROM t_fanding_log tfl JOIN t_fanding tf ON tfl.fanding_no = tf.no JOIN t_creator tc ON tf.creator_no = tc.no JOIN t_member tm ON tc.member_no = tm.no WHERE tfl.start_date BETWEEN '2025-08-01' AND '2025-08-31' AND tm.nickname IN ('강환국 작가', '고래돈공부');
